text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump You care about is economy which is about to tank again as  #covid19 virus rages out of control adding the most numbers yesterday of new cases (50K) in any country... but yay, furloughed workers went back to work to be put at risk! also this: https://t.co/1a1FhBMjth
